data.expected_result: I remember clearly that in older versions it used to show an error toast saying invite is invalid
data.short_description: The "Join a server" screen no longer shows an error toast when invite code has invalid syntax
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down in your server list - Tap + button and Join a server  - Enter invite code with invalid syntax (for example add a special character other than hyphen an underscore) - Tap Join
